NASDAQ: LSCC -10
Supply Chain Management –Commitment to High ESG Standards
As a fabless semiconductor company, Lattice 
utilizes a subcontracted supply chainWe hold ourselves to high ESG 
Standards and require our suppliers to 
have strong ESG programs as part of 
the qualification process
We work exclusively with industry -leading suppliers.  Our 
primary silicon foundry partners include: 
 UMC
 , 
TSMC
 , and 
Samsung
 . Each of these silicon suppliers are leaders in the 
semiconductor industry as well as leaders in corporate 
responsibility. 
Our primary OSAT (Assembly & Test) partner is 
 Advanced 
Semiconductor Engineering (ASE)
 with an industry 
leading ESG program.
SUPPLY CHAIN
